reviews.text: Small and easy to find you platform. Help is always on site if needed.No toilets though,just to let you know 😉
A nice station with frequent services. Only problem is that there is barely any staff after midday.

Lovely station, lovely people. Just signs to direct passengers from platform 2 to platform 1 need to be clearer, as the underpass comes out on platform 1 side but entrance to the platform is 20m to the left (when Station centre is closed), signs to find that entrance could be more obvious for those passengers in a rush, myself and two other passengers nearly missed our train.

reviews.author_name: James Dee - Birder in a campervan
reviews.text: Nowhere to buy tickets.  Machines broken.  No staff to open barriers.  When a staff member did turn up, he was very grumpy and unprofessional.  I blame the company for not putting enough staff on.
I love my home town   cool train station
